doc.title: Codename: Kids Next Door Operation - Video Game

credit.role: Wallabee Beatles (Numbuh 4)/Delightful Children from down the Lane
Nigel Uno (Numbuh 1)/Hoagie P. Gilligan Jr. (Numbuh 2)/Delightful Children from down the Lane

doc.plot: The powerful villain known as 'Father' has recently freed various villains from the Kids Next Door Arctic Base, a prison for criminal adults such as Stickybeard, Knightbrace, The Common Cold, Gramma Stuffum, The Toiletnator, and more nasty villains. It's up to the Sector V Team, the heroes of the cartoon series, to capture them and gather "Powuh Ups," collect and build their weapons, and get ready for an epic showdown on the Moon Base.
